room_title: Escape room "Element Z" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
room_address: 3191 Harbor Blvd Unit C Port Charlotte, FL 33952
room_description:
You are an elite task force unit who specializes in defusing chemical and viral explosive devices. After a bomb has been set off in LA, you have been tasked with stopping a terrorist/ex-employee of the CDC and have tracked him to a small apartment in New York. Intel has stated there is a high probability of another explosive device inside that apartment. 
The bombs release a virus that turns men and women into mindless hyper-aggressive monsters, who can spread the virus by biting or scratching anyone they come into contact with. LA has already gone dark. Itâ€™s up to you to save the day and humanity by defusing the bomb. Are you up to the task?
